fullText: What makes this show so winning is not just the brilliant performances by Josh Gad and Andrew Rannells, but the way it celebrates the very human need to create something meaningful, even when — especially when — you have no idea what you're doing.
dtliExcerpt: What makes this show so winning is not just the brilliant performances by Josh Gad and Andrew Rannells, but the way it celebrates the very human need to create something meaningful, even when — especially when — you have no idea what you're doing.
